dict.string:
Adblock Fast should be kept up to date to block new types of ads.

Do you want to be notified (infrequently) when important updates are available?

**To** **allow** **Adblock** **Fast** **to** **block** **ads** **in** **Safari:**

1. press the Home button,
2. tap the **Settings** app,
3. tap **Safari** > (under GENERAL) **Content** **Blockers**, then
4. toggle the **Adblock** **Fast** switch on.

To unblock ads, navigate back to this screen.

Contact us at https://twitter.com/adblockfast.

**Adblock** **Fast**
The World’s Fastest Ad Blocker
1.1.0

© Rocketship .
All rights reserved.
